member.name: NMLVLINK
member.summary: Contains information about an LVN_LINKCLICK notification code.

member.name: NMLVLINK.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains basic information about the notification code.

member.name: NMLVLINK.link
member.summary: structure that contains information about the link that was clicked.

member.name: NMLVLINK.iItem
member.summary: Index of the item that contains the link.

member.name: NMLVLINK.iSubItem
member.summary: Subitem, if any. This member may be NULL. For a link in a group header, this is the group identifier, as set in .
